thread.title: Book readership in all forms declines, national study reveals
thread.title_full: Book readership in all forms declines, national study reveals

title: Book readership in all forms declines, national study reveals
text:
Published By: Houston Chronicle Texas - Today 
Book reading in America continued a generally downward trend in the 12 months ending in April, a Pew Research Center study released Tuesday ...
